schema.description: Gets the latest sale state for the given token. This will either be the current sale if there is one in progress or the last completed one.
schema.title: Latest sale state

token_address.ui:title: Token Address
token_address.ui:description: The address of the token for which you want to retrieve the latest sale state.

token_id.ui:title: Token ID
token_id.ui:description: The unique identifier of the token for which you want to retrieve the latest sale state.
